activities: Altum is implementing a Grants Management System for the NIHR Evaluation, Trials and Studies Coordinating Centre (NETSCC) in Southampton, England and as part of the software development process NETSCC has asked Altum to use test data provided by NETSCC which may contain personal information.  All data provided by NETSCC to Altum will be safely and securely stored in Altum's secure data center and the data will only be used for testing software being developed by Altum.
personaldata: Clinical trial data related to Grants and the testing and development of a new software system.
